meanings.definition: A type of sausage made with pork intestines.
meanings.sent1: I tried the andouillette at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The andouillette was delicious with mustard.
meanings.sent3: The andouillette sausage rolled off the plate!
meanings.sent4: The andouillette looked like a coiled snake on the grill.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the andouillette filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A dish made with andouillette sausage.
meanings.sent1: Mom cooked a tasty andouillette for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The andouillette dish was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The andouillette sausage danced on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The andouillette dish was a tower of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The andouillette dish was a colorful masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: I love trying new andouillette dishes.
meanings.sent3: The andouillette cuisine made me feel like a chef.
meanings.sent4: The andouillette cuisine was a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The andouillette cuisine was a culinary adventure.
